data.title: Jacob Mangum-Farrar - Football 2018
data.meta_description: Football 2018 - Jacob Mangum-Farrar: The Official Athletic Site of Stanford University, partner of WMT Digital. The most comprehensive coverage of Stanford Athletics with rosters, schedules, scores, highlights, game recaps, and more!
data.text:
As a Fifth Year (2022)

Competed in nine matchups, earning seven starts at inside linebacker

Finished sixth on the team with 44 tackles, adding 1.5 tackles for loss, two pass deflections and one forced fumble

As a Senior (2021)

Appeared in the final 11 games making four starts at inside linebacker

Finished eighth on the team with 41 tackles, adding a sack and a pass breakup

Returned from injury for the first time since 2019 at No. 14 USC, making two tackles (Sept. 11)

Started against No. 3 Oregon, making eight tackles (Oct. 2)

First career sack came at No. 22 Arizona State (Oct. 8)

Made a career-high 12 tackles at Oregon State (Nov. 13)

As a Junior (2020)

Did not see action

As a Sophomore (2019)

Played in first two games before suffering season-ending injury

As a Freshman (2018)

Played in each of the last four games - eligible to retain year of eligibility via NCAA redshirt rules

Made collegiate debut in win over Oregon St. (Nov. 10)

Stanford went 4-0 in games in which he played

Prior to Stanford

Prepped at Kempner (Texas) under head coach Darrin Andrus

Nation’s 316th-best recruit by 247Sports

Nation’s 23rd-best outside linebacker by 247Sports, 64th by ESPN

Texas’ 46th-best recruit by 247Sports, 65th by PrepStar

85 tackles (nine for loss), two sacks, four forced fumbles, one fumble recovery for 99 yards as a senior

110.5 tackles (10 for loss), two sacks, two forced fumbles and three pass breakups as a junior

Two-time all-district first team

Two-time academic all-district

2017 Nike Regional Linebacker MVP

Also competed in track

District and area champion in 300m hurdles

Personal
